parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the motorcycle to stall or shut down without warning, leading to a loss of control and potentially resulting in accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The motorcycle shuts down or stalls without warning
the horn may not function properly
and the circuit breaker may pop or reset.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the cam shaft tensioner can cause catastrophic engine failure, leading to the engine stopping suddenly, which can leave the rider stranded in the middle of the roadway and potentially cause accidents or injuries.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Crankshaft Failure due to Improper Tempering
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the crankshaft can cause the engine to seize, leading to loss of control, accidents, or engine damage.
symptoms: often on the right side of the motor
resulting in a sudden loss of power and potentially catastrophic consequences.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Speedometer and Engine Idle Control Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the speedometer and engine idle control can cause the engine to idle erratically, leading to loss of control, accidents, or engine damage.
symptoms: The speedometer needle drops to zero
and the engine idle control degrades
